wikipedia_page.main: Paul Victor Falzon Sant Manduca (born 15 November 1951) was chairman of Prudential plc in the United Kingdom from July 2012 until December 2020. Paul Manduca was awarded a Maltese Order of Merit in December 2018.

response: * Paul Manduca, chairman of Prudential plc (2012-2020)
Prudential's Paul Manduca replaced Iain Cornish as the firm's chairman after its AGM in May 2021. As of the same month, St. James's Place reportedly has over £135 billion in funds under management.
* Paul Manduca (Chairman, TheCityUK Advisory Council) (Chairman, Prudential)

In June 2017, RateSetter raised £13m from existing shareholders, including Woodford Investment Management and Artemis, bringing the total amount raised to £41.5m. The following month, Paul Manduca became chairman of RateSetter; he is also chairman of Prudential plc.
*2017 – CEOs Armin Papperger and Ulrich Grillo and major shareholders of Rheinmetall, Larry Fink (Black Rock) and Paul Manduca

link_mentions.page: List of Honorary Fellows of Hertford College, Oxford

response: In 1985 they set up a joint venture with the Bank of Tokyo called the Bank of Tokyo-Touche Remnant Asset Management Limited. In 1989 Paul Manduca became Chief Executive Officer of TR, where upon he engineered their takeover by Société Générale.
